attributes.action: Support shop workers during the CV pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Shop workers are an essential part of this countries economy and well being. You don’t need to travel but everyone needs to eat!
attributes.background: Ensure that shop workers are paid above the SSP threshold

rejection.details:
We have published a petition calling on the Government to remove the minimum earnings threshold for Statutory Sick Pay, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300669

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
